verses.verse: And <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> from the <S%G2446>Jordan<s%> and was <S%G71>led<s%> about by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>

for <S%G5065>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> being <S%G3985>tempted<s%> by the <S%G1228>devil.<s%> And He <S%G2068>ate<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G1722>during<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days;<s%> and when they had <S%G4931>ended,<s%> He became <S%G3983>hungry.<s%>

And the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1487>"If<s%> You are the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%> to <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>"
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> him, "It is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G444>'Man<s%> shall not <S%G2198>live<s%> on <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G3441>alone.<s%>'"
And he <S%G321>led<s%> Him up and <S%G1166>showed<s%> Him <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G932>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%G3625>world<s%> in a <S%G4743>moment<s%> of <S%G5550>time.<s%>

And the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "I will <S%G1325>give<s%> You <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1849>domain<s%> and its <S%G1391>glory;<s%> for it has been <S%G3860>handed<s%> <S%G3860>over<s%> to me, and I <S%G1325>give<s%> it to <S%G3739>whomever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> I <S%G2309>wish.<s%>
<S%G3767>"Therefore<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> You <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> me, it shall <S%G3956>all<s%> be <S%G4674>Yours.<s%>"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "It is <S%G1125>written,<s%> 'You shall <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> your <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3000>serve<s%> Him <S%G3441>only.<s%>'"

And he <S%G71>led<s%> Him to <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> and had Him <S%G2476>stand<s%> on the <S%G4419>pinnacle<s%> of the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1487>"If<s%> You are the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G906>throw<s%> <S%G4572>Yourself<s%> <S%G2736>down<s%> from <S%G1782>here;<s%>
for it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> 'He will <S%G1781>give<s%> His <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1781>charge<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> You to <S%G1314>guard<s%> You,'
and, 'On [their] <S%G5495>hands<s%> they will <S%G142>bear<s%> You up, <S%G3379>Lest<s%> You <S%G4350>strike<s%> Your <S%G4228>foot<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> a <S%G3037>stone.<s%>' "

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "It is <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'You shall not <S%G1598>put<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> your <S%G2316>God<s%> to the <S%G1598>test.<s%>'"
And when the <S%G1228>devil<s%> had <S%G4931>finished<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3986>temptation,<s%> he <S%G868>departed<s%> from Him <S%G891>until<s%> an <S%G2540>opportune<s%> <S%G2540>time.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> to <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> in the <S%G1411>power<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit;<s%> and <S%G5345>news<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> Him <S%G1831>spread<s%> <S%G2596>through<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G4066>surrounding<s%> <S%G4066>district.<s%>
And He [began] <S%G1321>teaching<s%> in their <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> and was <S%G1392>praised<s%> by <S%G3956>all.<s%>

And He <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G3478>Nazareth,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> He had <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G5142>brought<s%> up; and as was His <S%G1486>custom,<s%> He <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> and <S%G450>stood<s%> up to <S%G314>read.<s%>

And the <S%G975>book<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> was <S%G1929>handed<s%> to Him. And He <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> it was <S%G1125>written,<s%>

" The <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is upon Me, <S%G3739>Because<s%> <S%G1752><s%> He <S%G5548>anointed<s%> Me to <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor.<s%> He has <S%G649>sent<s%> Me to <S%G2784>proclaim<s%> <S%G859>release<s%> to the <S%G164>captives,<s%> And <S%G309>recovery<s%> of <S%G309>sight<s%> to the <S%G5185>blind,<s%> To <S%G649>set<s%> <S%G1722>free<s%> <S%G859><s%> those who are <S%G2352>downtrodden,<s%>
To <S%G2784>proclaim<s%> the <S%G1184>favorable<s%> <S%G1763>year<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>"

And He <S%G4428>closed<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> and <S%G591>gave<s%> it <S%G591>back<s%> to the <S%G5257>attendant,<s%> and <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down;<s%> and the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> were <S%G816>fixed<s%> upon Him.
And He <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> to them, <S%G4594>"Today<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> has been <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> in your <S%G3775>hearing.<s%>"

And <S%G3956>all<s%> were <S%G3140>speaking<s%> <S%G3140>well<s%> of Him, and <S%G2296>wondering<s%> at the <S%G5485>gracious<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> which were <S%G1607>falling<s%> from His <S%G4750>lips;<s%> and they were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Is <S%G3778>this<s%> not Joseph's <S%G5207>son<s%>?"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3843>"No<s%> <S%G3843>doubt<s%> you will <S%G3004>quote<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3850>proverb<s%> to Me, <S%G2395>'Physician,<s%> <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G4572>yourself!<s%> <S%G3745>Whatever<s%> we <S%G191>heard<s%> was <S%G1096>done<s%> at <S%G2746>Capernaum,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> in your <S%G3968>home<s%> <S%G3968>town<s%> as <S%G2532>well.<s%>'"
And He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G4396>prophet<s%> is <S%G1184>welcome<s%> in his <S%G3968>home<s%> <S%G3968>town.<s%>

" But I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you in <S%G225>truth,<s%> there were <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5503>widows<s%> in <S%G2474>Israel<s%> in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G2243>Elijah,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G3772>sky<s%> was <S%G2808>shut<s%> up for <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> and <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G3376>months,<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3042>famine<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1093>land;<s%>

and yet <S%G2243>Elijah<s%> was <S%G3992>sent<s%> to <S%G3762>none<s%> of them, but <S%G1487>only<s%> <S%G3361><s%> to <S%G4558>Zarephath,<s%> [in the land] of <S%G4606>Sidon,<s%> to a <S%G1135>woman<s%> who was a <S%G5503>widow.<s%>

"And there were <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3015>lepers<s%> in <S%G2474>Israel<s%> in the <S%G1909>time<s%> of <S%G1666>Elisha<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet;<s%> and <S%G3762>none<s%> of them was <S%G2511>cleansed,<s%> but <S%G1487>only<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3483>Naaman<s%> the <S%G4948>Syrian.<s%>"
And <S%G3956>all<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> were <S%G4092>filled<s%> with <S%G2372>rage<s%> as they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things;<s%>

and they <S%G450>rose<s%> up and <S%G1544>cast<s%> Him out of the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G71>led<s%> Him to the <S%G3790>brow<s%> of the <S%G3735>hill<s%> on <S%G3739>which<s%> their <S%G4172>city<s%> had been <S%G3618>built,<s%> in <S%G5620>order<s%> to <S%G2630>throw<s%> Him <S%G2630>down<s%> the <S%G2630>cliff.<s%>
But <S%G1330>passing<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> their <S%G3319>midst,<s%> He <S%G4198>went<s%> His <S%G4198>way.<s%>
And He <S%G2718>came<s%> <S%G2718>down<s%> to <S%G2746>Capernaum,<s%> a <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%> And He was <S%G1321>teaching<s%> them on the <S%G4521>Sabbath;<s%>
and they were <S%G1605>amazed<s%> at His <S%G1322>teaching,<s%> for His <S%G3056>message<s%> was with <S%G1849>authority.<s%>

And there was a <S%G444>man<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> <S%G2192>possessed<s%> by the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G1140>demon,<s%> and he <S%G349>cried<s%> out with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%>

<S%G1436>"Ha!<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> do we have to do with You, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3479>Nazareth<s%>? Have You <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> us? I <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> You are â€“ the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G40>One<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Be <S%G5392>quiet<s%> and <S%G1831>come<s%> out of him!" And when the <S%G1140>demon<s%> had <S%G4496>thrown<s%> him <S%G4496>down<s%> in [their] <S%G3319>midst,<s%> he <S%G1831>came<s%> out of him <S%G3367>without<s%> <S%G984>doing<s%> him <S%G3367>any<s%> <S%G984>harm.<s%>

And <S%G2285>amazement<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> upon them <S%G3956>all,<s%> and they [began] <S%G4814>discussing<s%> with <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>message<s%>? For with <S%G1849>authority<s%> and <S%G1411>power<s%> He <S%G2004>commands<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> and they <S%G1831>come<s%> out."
And the <S%G2279>report<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> Him was <S%G1607>getting<s%> out into <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>locality<s%> in the <S%G4066>surrounding<s%> <S%G4066>district.<s%>

And He <S%G450>arose<s%> and [left] the <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> and <S%G1525>entered<s%> Simon's <S%G3614>home.<s%> <S%G1161>Now<s%> Simon's mother-in-law was <S%G4912>suffering<s%> from a <S%G3173>high<s%> <S%G4446>fever;<s%> and they <S%G2065>made<s%> <S%G2065>request<s%> of Him on her <S%G4012>behalf.<s%>

And <S%G2186>standing<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> her, He <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> the <S%G4446>fever,<s%> and it <S%G863>left<s%> her; and she <S%G3916>immediately<s%> <S%G450>arose<s%> and <S%G1247>waited<s%> on them.

And while the <S%G2246>sun<s%> was <S%G1416>setting,<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G3745>who<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> any <S%G770>sick<s%> with <S%G4164>various<s%> <S%G3554>diseases<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> them to Him; and <S%G2007>laying<s%> His <S%G5495>hands<s%> on <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of them, He was <S%G2323>healing<s%> them.

And <S%G1140>demons<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> were <S%G1831>coming<s%> out of <S%G4183>many,<s%> <S%G2905>crying<s%> out and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "You are the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>" And <S%G2008>rebuking<s%> them, He would not <S%G1439>allow<s%> them to <S%G2980>speak,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G3609>knew<s%> Him to be the <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

And when <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G1096>came,<s%> He <S%G1831>departed<s%> and <S%G4198>went<s%> to a <S%G2048>lonely<s%> <S%G5117>place;<s%> and the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> were <S%G1934>searching<s%> for Him, and <S%G2064>came<s%> to Him, and tried to <S%G2722>keep<s%> Him from <S%G4198>going<s%> <S%G4198>away<s%> from them.

But He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "I <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to the <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G4172>cities<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> for I was <S%G649>sent<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> purpose."
And He kept on <S%G2784>preaching<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> of <S%G2453>Judea.<s%>
